dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 524 IH: To amend the Coastal Barrier Resources Act to create an exemption for certain shoreline borrow sites.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Rouzer introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Coastal Barrier Resources Act to create an exemption for certain shoreline borrow sites.

section.header: Exemption to Coastal Barrier restrictions for shoreline borrow sites
section.text: Section 6 of the Coastal Barrier Resources Act (16 U.S.C. 3505) is amended by adding at the end the following new subsection:

subsection.text: Section 5 shall not apply to expenditures or financial assistance relating to the use of funds to use a borrow site located within the System if such site has been in use as a borrow site by a coastal storm risk management project for a period of more than 15 years.
